attr.title: Her Name Was Fire
attr.desc: A Tarotpunk twin-stick roguelike where you progressively unlock spells and upgrades to defeat hordes of void creatures. Survive the 5 stages of grief and vanquish the Major Allegories.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://tissueinu.itch.io/her-name-was-fire) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/2083840/Her_Name_Was_Fire). Download, extract (if .zip), and copy the HNWF.pck file to the hernamewasfire/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://tissueinu.itch.io/her-name-was-fire) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2083840/Her_Name_Was_Fire). Download, extract (if .zip), and copy the `HNWF.pck` file to the `hernamewasfire/gamedata` folder.
